@PeterAbraham @profgalloway @patagonia Funny, at @Audi I used to preach about how commoditized cars had become and how customer experience (and marketing) was becoming the only differentiator. The technical differences between a @MBUSA and a @Hyundai are slimmer than ever. They’ve all reached feature parity.
@NTagouri No, best bet is to back up your contacts, wipe the phone, and set it up as a new phone. Transfer only contacts back.

@JuiceboxCA This is such an interesting question. Never thought about it this way, but an artist’s morality definitely influences how much or how little I appreciate and enjoy their contribution to culture.
@PeterAbraham @profgalloway Are you just talking about just automobiles? Or all brands? If the former, I would agree. If the latter, look no further than Beats by Dre to be disproven.

@thejulielogan But wish I could’ve done more. Saw the cops come and chase after the guy, but I have no idea what happened after that. Or what happened to her. 😞

Just saw a man and a woman beating each other up in their car. Dude threw her stuff out, dragged her out of the car, and sped off. I called 911 and ran out to ask if she needed help.
She calmly said, “No, it was my fault. I hit him first” and walked away.
I’m so confused.
